Portal 2 is everything you loved about portal 1. Follows up the prequel storyline well. Puzzles are engaging and rewarding to complete. More fun easter eggs to discover. Its a good game
n1

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, la historia parece simple pero es mas compleja de lo que parece a simple vista.
Los puzzles son muy divertidos y muy bien pensados, los personajes aunque pocos son lo suficientemente interesantes para mantener la historia.
El juego en si es muy corto pero si tomas en cuenta el modo coop y las salas de la comunidad puedes tener muchisimas mas horas de juego.
Incredibly fun and enjoyable game. The single player story is incredible whilst co-op also is extremely fun.
not too long of a game as it only took 6 hours. very good game, well made. final boss was kinda eh though. 9/10

Lots of fun, gets your brain working to complete most of the chambers but overall a great puzzle game with a brilliant story linked to its first game: portal.

An exemplary sequel that certainly does justice to it's first game. [b]More game-mechanics, more story, more fun[/b]. If you are wondering to get this game or not, do.

The game also features a pretty cool co-op mission where you can test your teamwork. It also comes with a level editor which is cool and you can upload or download levels in the Workshop.

[b] Hala almadınız mı ? [/b] diye başlamak istiyorum. Bir bulmacayı çözemedikçe daha çok zevk vermesi nasıl olabilir ? bu oyun bulmacaları çözemedikçe sizi sıkmıyor, aksine daha çok denemeye itiyor. İlk oyunun ardından bu oyun yeni yeni bulmaca mekanikleriyle, hele hele hikayesiyle ve müzikleriyle muhteşem olmuş. Valve gerçekten bu işi yapmış. Bütün her şey çok güzeldi, sadece müzikleri için bile alınır. Tam anlamıyla bir [b] [i] "Masterpiece" [/i] [/b].


[b] [i] -Now I only want you gone [/i] [/b]

This game and the original Portal are really great games with amazing stories, puzzles, music, and everything! Seriously one of my favorite games ever. You will NOT regret buying this game, but make sure you buy the original Portal first or some of the story won't make any sense to you.

Absolutely amazing

Puzzles - Sometimes challenging, sometimes nice and easy to complete

Visuals - Impressive considering how old the game is

Storyline - One of the best I know... There are so many hidden easter eggs around, secrets, dialogue, it's great

Do buy it if you have even a small interest in it

I have been playing this game for MANY years, and only recently got it on PC. This game isn't as big brain as Portal 1, but it's certainly not for people who stare at the juice carton because it says "concentrate".

“Portal 2” is a fantastic puzzle based FPS game that can be completed in about 5-7 hours or less depending on your skill level (personal experience). It can also run on a potato of a PC, so even people without amazing rigs can still enjoy it!
i used my brain
iz guud gaem

Absolutely, without a doubt, the greatest game I've ever played in my life.  I first played this game on its original release date back in 2011, and i have to say almost ten years later, i will never forget the impact it had on me. The characters, music, gameplay mechanics, world building, environmental storytelling, humor, it is all perfect to me.  This is without a doubt the most unforgettable experience I've ever gotten from a video game.  PLEASE buy this game!
